articles.author: Joe Rao
articles.title: What will happen during the partial solar eclipse of March 2025? - Space.com
articles.description: Observers across eastern North America and much of Europe will have front-row seats to the striking partial solar eclipse on March 29. Here's what to expect.
articles.content:
What a difference a year makes!
Just a year ago, countless millions across North America were anxiously awaiting the "great North American total eclipse of the sun"
 on April 8. Now, less than a ye… [+9628 chars]

articles.author: Claudia Chiappa
articles.title: Nearly 3M HIV deaths due to foreign aid cuts, study forecasts - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Researchers warn that decades of progress in HIV treatment and prevention could be undone.
articles.content: Over 10 million more people could be infected with HIV and nearly 3 million people could die by the end of the decade because of foreign aid cuts by Western governments, new research published today … [+534 chars]
